For each of these words, I choose:

* Bottle - Black
* Camera - White
* Coke - Black
* Ice cream - White
* Phone - Black
* Walkman - White
* Wallet - Black
* Axe - Black
* Cannon - White
* Grenade - Black
* Mace - Black
* Revolver - White
* Rifle - Black
* Sword - White

I hope you enjoyed this game with me, my love! *hug*
